## Analyzing Xenium spatial transcriptomics data for allelic bias

### SNP selection

100bp probes were designed to tag exonic (or intronic) SNPs that are in high 
LD (R^2 >0.8) with *cis*-eSNPs.

[Information on eQTL and tag-SNPs](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1f7HtQC07PWa1ij9UxTmgrEMX2OnHDVcrpn7Oa_VNIms/edit?usp=sharing)
